entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning with 30 percent chance of showers later this morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 27 April 2023
